LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_LeatherChain_Tooltip: Enables leather production chain, where animals give hides that must be processed into leather.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_WoodChain_Tooltip: Enables timber production chain, where trees give logs that have to be cut into planks for more use.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_ClothChain_Tooltip: Enables the cloth production chain, where raw materials from plans have to be spun into cloth.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_IndustrialJunk_Tooltip: Remove vanilla industrial junk during map creation.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_ExostriderRemains_Tool: Remove Biotech's exostrider remains during map creation.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_HornetNest_Tooltip: Remove hornet nests during map creation.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_VanillaMine_Tooltip: Restores vanilla mineables. Medieval Overhaul mineables will still be available.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_RefuelableTorch_Toolti: Removes fuel and heat from Vanilla and Medieval Overhaul torches.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_BoomalopeTar_Tooltip: Replace chemfuel with tar from Boomalopes and similar animals.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_MealRetexture_Tooltip: Retextures vanilla meal textures with Medieval Overhaul style graphics.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_SchematicRework_Toolti: Replace schematics scrolls with Biotech style analyzer.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Settings_SlopDispenser_Tooltip: Recommend turning off for industrial playthroughs.
